key_risks: Securities litigation related to alleged misrepresentations and omissions
Global supply chain disruptions, including semiconductor shortages
Dependence on Honeywell for a significant portion of revenue
Cybersecurity vulnerabilities due to connected home devices
Intense competitive pressure in the smart home and building automation markets
controversies: Class-action securities lawsuit (In re Resideo Technologies, Inc. Securities Litigation)
Potential reputational damage from litigation and supply chain issues
governance_issues: Litigation risks indicating potential governance challenges
Cybersecurity governance processes disclosed, but vulnerabilities remain
